name: Massive multiplayer war shooter
description: Massive multiplayer war shooter - a cool battle game that pits players against each other in a struggle for survival
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
